body_text: I think this should be more React-y and use state instead of an instance variable, then we would not need the constructor, only state = { shouldNotify: true, };
body: I think this should be more React-y and use `state` instead of an instance variable, then we would not need the constructor, only `state = { shouldNotify: true, };`
body_html: I think this should be more React-y and use state instead of an instance variable, then we would not need the constructor, only state = { shouldNotify: true, };
